mapper.update:
UPDATE blog_article
content = #{content},
title = #{title},
isPrivate = #{isPrivate},
pubDate = #{pubDate},
summary = #{summary},
art_level = #{level}, art_lock = #{lockId},
art_status = #{status,javaType=ArticleStatus,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler},
art_from = #{from,javaType=ArticleFrom,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler},
space_id = #{space.id},
art_hidden = #{hidden},
comment_config = #{commentConfig.id}, art_alias = #{alias}, lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT art.id AS art_id, art.pubDate, art.lastModifyDate, art.title, art.isPrivate, art.hits, art.comments, art.summary, art.art_level, art.art_status, art.art_from, art.space_id, art.art_lock, art.art_alias, art.art_hidden, sp.space_alias, space_lock, sp.space_name, sp.space_art_hidden, sp.is_private AS space_is_private, GROUP_CONCAT(bt.tag_name) AS tags FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_article_tag bat ON bat.article_id = art.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_tag bt ON bat.tag_id = bt.id WHERE art.id IN #{id} GROUP BY art.id ORDER BY FIELD(art.id, #{id} )

SELECT pubDate,COUNT(art.id) AS art_count,art.id FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id WHERE art_status = 0
AND art.isPrivate = false AND sp.is_private = false
AND space_id = #{space.id}
AND IFNULL(art.art_hidden, false) = false AND sp.space_art_hidden = false
GROUP BY YEAR(pubDate)
GROUP BY YEAR(pubDate),MONTH(pubDate)
GROUP BY YEAR(pubDate),MONTH(pubDate),DATE(pubDate)

SELECT space_id,space_alias,space_name,COUNT(art.id) AS art_count,art.id AS art_id FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id WHERE art_status = 0 AND IFNULL(art.art_hidden, false) = false AND sp.space_art_hidden = false
AND art.isPrivate = false AND sp.is_private = false
GROUP BY space_id
WHERE art.art_status = 1 AND art.pubDate <= #{date} GROUP BY art.id
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_article SET hits = hits + #{hits} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE blog_article SET comments = comments + #{comments} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(hits) AS totalHits, SUM(comments) AS totalComments, MAX(lastModifyDate) AS lastModifyDate, MAX(pubDate) AS lastPubDate FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id WHERE art.art_status = 0
AND art.space_id = #{space.id}
AND IFNULL(art.art_hidden, false) = false AND sp.space_art_hidden = false
AND art.isPrivate = false AND sp.is_private = false

SELECT art.id AS art_id, art.pubDate, art.title, sp.space_alias, sp.space_name, art.art_alias FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id WHERE art.art_status != 3 ORDER BY art.pubDate DESC,art.id DESC LIMIT 0,#{limit}
mapper.sql: SELECT art.id AS art_id, art.content, art.pubDate, art.lastModifyDate, art.title, art.isPrivate, art.hits, art.comments, art.summary, art.art_level, art.art_status, art.art_from, art.editor, art.space_id, art.art_lock, art.art_alias, art.art_hidden, sp.space_alias, sp.space_name, sp.space_art_hidden, space_lock, bcc.allowComment, bcc.comment_mode, bcc.comment_asc, bcc.comment_allowHtml, bcc.comment_limitSec, bcc.comment_limitCount, bcc.comment_check, bcc.id AS comment_config_id, sp.is_private AS space_is_private, GROUP_CONCAT(bt.tag_name) AS tags FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_article_tag bat ON bat.article_id = art.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_tag bt ON bat.tag_id = bt.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_comment_config bcc ON art.comment_config = bcc.id
